ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location
Class WifiLocation

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location.Location
      ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location.WifiLocation

public class WifiLocation
extends Location

A location characterized by observable wifi base stations and the measured signal strength corresponding to each base station. Distance is computed by measuring the difference between signal strengths for base stations that are common to both locations, with a requirement that the locations have a substantial fraction of the base stations in common.

Field Summary
static double EPS
          Epsilon from the paper, maximum distance between neighbouring points.
static double ETA
          ETA is the percentage of WAPs that must be shared for two observations to have a finite distance between them.
static double MERGE_DIST
          Distance threshold for merging two locations.
